student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi there! How was your last month?
Hi! Last month was good. I went to the beachs.
That sounds fun! Which beaches did you go to?
I went to Miami Beach and Santa Monica.
Nice! How was the weather there?
The weather were sunny and warm.
It's great that you enjoyed the sun. Did you do anything else interesting last month?
Yes, I visited a museum and tried new foods.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
